definition: meager/slight/weak/ungenerous or unkind/frivolous/to despise/to belittle/to look down on/to approach or near

sentences.english: For another thing, using the rolling pin make the dough round and thin.
sentences.chinese: 接下來，用擀麪棍把麪糰擀成圓的薄餅。

sentences.english: Curries and Pancakes are famous in India.
sentences.chinese: 咖喱和薄餅在印度是出名的。

sentences.english: I feel I elephant a thin pancake drive a hideous mess of crumple indiscriminately.
sentences.chinese: 我感覺自己就象一張薄餅被亂七八糟的亂揉着。

sentences.english: Eating pancakes in Wenzhou area, on the Dragon Boat Festival every family there is the custom of eating pancakes.
sentences.chinese: 喫薄餅在溫州地區，端午節家家還有喫薄餅的習俗。

sentences.english: Eating pancakes in Wenzhou area, on the Dragon Boat Festival every family there is the custom of eating pancakes.
sentences.chinese: 喫薄餅在溫州地區，端午節家家還有喫薄餅的習俗。

sentences.english: After eating the pancakes, overflowing with happiness, the old collector said he would take a nap.
sentences.chinese: 老收藏家喫過烤薄餅，滿心歡喜，又想打個盹。

sentences.english: The cake easily slid out of the pan.
sentences.chinese: 那塊薄餅很輕易地從鍋裏滑落出來。

sentences.english: In the southern city, authentic crackers and steamed rice cakes are famous.
sentences.chinese: 而在南部城市，地道的脆薄餅和蒸米糕都很知名。

sentences.english: The wall-ring was blackened and twisted like a burnt bannock.
sentences.chinese: 牆上的鐵環象烤焦的薄餅，變黑了，扭曲變形。

sentences.english: I ended up eating Pizza for five days in a row.
sentences.chinese: 我導致連續喫薄餅五天。

sentences.english: Certainly, sir. First, hold a pancake in our left hand and using a section of raw.
sentences.chinese: 當然可以，先生，首先，您左手拿住薄餅，用。

sentences.english: Settle down and eat your pancakes.
No heart-shaped egg and pancake molds?
sentences.chinese: 沒有心形的雞蛋和薄餅模嗎？

sentences.english: So where we going, House of pancakes or The Sizzler?
sentences.chinese: 我們去哪喫飯，薄餅屋還是時時樂自助？

sentences.english: On a plate in front of him was piled a pyramid of flat white biscuits.
sentences.chinese: 在他面前的盤子上有一摞擺成金字塔形狀的白色薄餅。
